original: Udāna 4.1
analyzed: udāna

original: Meghiyasutta
analyzed: meghiya sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā cālikāyaṁ viharati cālike pabbate.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā cālikāyam viharati cālike pabbate

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā meghiyo bhagavato upaṭṭhāko hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā meghiyaḥ bhagavataḥ upaṭṭhākaḥ hoti

original: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā meghiyaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho āyasmā meghiyaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “icchāmahaṁ, bhante, jantugāmaṁ piṇḍāya pavisitun”ti.
analyzed: icchāmaha bhante jantu gāmam piṇḍāya pavisitunti

original: “Yassadāni tvaṁ, meghiya, kālaṁ maññasī”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ sadāni tva meghiya kālam maññasi iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya jantugāmaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā meghiyaḥ pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya jantugāmam piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīraṁ tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantaḥ yena kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīram tena upasaṅkami

original: Addasā kho āyasmā meghiyo kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīre jaṅghāvihāraṁ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno ambavanaṁ pāsādikaṁ manuññaṁ ramaṇīyaṁ.
analyzed: addasā kho āyasmā meghiyaḥ kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīre jaṅghāvihāram anucaṅkamamānaḥ anuvicaramānaḥ ambavanam pāsādikam manuññam ramaṇīya

original: Disvānassa etadahosi:
analyzed: disvānassa etat ahosi

original: “pāsādikaṁ vatidaṁ ambavanaṁ manuññaṁ ramaṇīyaṁ. Alaṁ vatidaṁ kulaputtassa padhānatthikassa padhānāya.
analyzed: pāsādikam vatidam ambavanam manuññam ramaṇīya alam vatidam kula puttassa padhānatthikassa padhānāya

original: Sace maṁ bhagavā anujāneyya, āgaccheyyāhaṁ imaṁ ambavanaṁ padhānāyā”ti.
analyzed: sace mam bhagavā anujāneyyaḥ āgaccheyya aham imam ambavanam padhānāya ati

original: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmā meghiyaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: eka mantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmai meghiyaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “Idhāhaṁ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya jantugāmaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisiṁ.
analyzed: idha aha bhante pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya jantugāmam piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīraṁ tenupasaṅkamiṁ.
analyzed: jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantaḥ yena kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīram tena upasaṅkami

original: Addasaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīre jaṅghāvihāraṁ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno ambavanaṁ pāsādikaṁ manuññaṁ ramaṇīyaṁ.
analyzed: addasam kho aha bhante kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīre jaṅghāvihāram anucaṅkamamānaḥ anuvicaramānaḥ ambavanam pāsādikam manuññam ramaṇīya

original: Disvāna me etadahosi:
analyzed: disvāna me etadahaḥ usi

original: ‘pāsādikaṁ vatidaṁ ambavanaṁ manuññaṁ ramaṇīyaṁ.
analyzed: pāsādikam vatidam ambavanam manuññam ramaṇīya

original: Alaṁ vatidaṁ kulaputtassa padhānatthikassa padhānāya.
analyzed: alam vatidam kula puttassa padhānatthikassa padhānāya

original: Sace maṁ bhagavā anujāneyya, āgaccheyyāhaṁ imaṁ ambavanaṁ padhānāyā’ti.
analyzed: sace mam bhagavā anujāneyyaḥ āgaccheyya aham imam ambavanam padhānāya ati

original: Sace maṁ, bhante, bhagavā anujānāti, gaccheyyāhaṁ taṁ ambavanaṁ padhānāyā”ti.
analyzed: sace ma bhante bhagavā anujānāti gaccheyya aham tam ambavanam padhānāya ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā āyasmantaṁ meghiyaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte bhagavān āyasmantam meghiyam etat avoca

original: “āgamehi tāva, meghiya, ekakamhi tāva, yāva aññopi koci bhikkhu āgacchatī”ti.
analyzed: āgamehi tāva meghiya ekakamhi tāva yāva añño api koci bhikkhu āgacchati iti

original: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: dutiyam pi khalu āyasmai meghiyaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “bhagavato, bhante, natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyaṁ, natthi katassa vā paticayo.
analyzed: bhagavataḥ bhante natthi kiñci uttari natthi katassa vā paticayo

original: Mayhaṁ kho pana, bhante, atthi uttari karaṇīyaṁ, atthi katassa paticayo.
analyzed: mayham kho pana bhante atthi uttari karaṇīya atthi katassa paticayaḥ

original: Sace maṁ bhagavā anujānāti, gaccheyyāhaṁ taṁ ambavanaṁ padhānāyā”ti.
analyzed: sace mam bhagavā anujānāti gaccheyya aham tam ambavanam padhānāya ati

original: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ meghiyaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: dutiyam pi khalu bhagavān āyasmantam meghiyam etat avoca

original: “āgamehi tāva, meghiya, ekakamhi tāva, yāva aññopi koci bhikkhu āgacchatī”ti.
analyzed: āgamehi tāva meghiya ekakamhi tāva yāva añño api koci bhikkhu āgacchati iti

original: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: tatiyam pi khalu āyasmai meghiyaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “bhagavato, bhante, natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyaṁ, natthi katassa vā paticayo.
analyzed: bhagavataḥ bhante natthi kiñci uttari natthi katassa vā paticayo

original: Mayhaṁ kho pana, bhante, atthi uttari karaṇīyaṁ, atthi katassa paticayo.
analyzed: mayham kho pana bhante atthi uttari karaṇīya atthi katassa paticayaḥ

original: Sace maṁ bhagavā anujānāti, gaccheyyāhaṁ taṁ ambavanaṁ padhānāyā”ti.
analyzed: sace mam bhagavā anujānāti gaccheyya aham tam ambavanam padhānāya ati

original: “Padhānanti kho, meghiya, vadamānaṁ kinti vadeyyāma?
analyzed: kho meghiya vadamānam kinti vadeyyāma

original: Yassadāni tvaṁ, meghiya, kālaṁ maññasī”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ sadāni tva meghiya kālam maññasi iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yena
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā meghiyaḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā yena

original: taṁ ambavanaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ ambavanaṁ ajjhogāhetvā aññatarasmiṁ
analyzed: tam ambavanam tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā tam ambavanam ajjhogāhetvā aññatarasmi

original: rukkhamūle divāvihāraṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: rukkha mūle divāvihāram

original: Atha kho āyasmato meghiyassa tasmiṁ ambavane viharantassa yebhuyyena tayo pāpakā akusalā vitakkā samudācaranti, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: atha kho āyasmataḥ meghiyassa tasmin ambavane viharantassa yebhuyyena tayaḥ pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ vitakkā samudācaranti

original: kāmavitakko, byāpādavitakko, vihiṁsāvitakko.
analyzed: kāma vitakkaḥ byāpāda vitakkaḥ vihisā vitakkaḥ

original: Atha kho āyasmato meghiyassa etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmataḥ meghiyassa etat ahosi

original: “acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho.
analyzed: acchariyam vata bho abbhutam vata bho

original: Saddhāya ca vatamhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā.
analyzed: saddhāya ca vatamhā agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajitā

original: Atha ca panimehi tīhi pāpakehi akusalehi vitakkehi anvāsattā, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: atha ca panimehi tīhi pāpakehi akusalehi vitakkehi anvāsattā

original: kāmavitakkena, byāpādavitakkena, vihiṁsāvitakkena”.
analyzed: kāma vitakkena byāpāda vitakkena vihisā vitakkena

original: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā meghiyaḥ sāyanha samayam paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmā

original: meghiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: meghiyaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “idha mayhaṁ, bhante, tasmiṁ ambavane viharantassa yebhuyyena tayo pāpakā akusalā vitakkā samudācaranti, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: idha bhante tasmin ambavane viharantassa yebhuyyena tayo pāpakā akusalā vitakkā samudācaranti

original: kāmavitakko, byāpādavitakko, vihiṁsāvitakko.
analyzed: kāma vitakkaḥ byāpāda vitakkaḥ vihisā vitakkaḥ

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, etadahosi:
analyzed: tassa mayha bhante

original: ‘acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho.
analyzed: acchariyam vata bho abbhutam vata bho

original: Saddhāya ca vatamhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā.
analyzed: saddhāya ca vatamhā agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajitā

original: Atha ca panimehi tīhi pāpakehi akusalehi vitakkehi anvāsattā, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: atha ca panimehi tīhi pāpakehi akusalehi vitakkehi anvāsattā

original: kāmavitakkena, byāpādavitakkena, vihiṁsāvitakkena’”.
analyzed: kāma vitakkena byāpāda vitakkena vihisā vitakkena

original: “Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā pañca dhammā paripākāya saṁvattanti.
analyzed: a paripakkāya meghiya cetaḥ vimuttiyāḥ pañca dhammā paripākāya savattanti

original: Katame pañca?
analyzed: katame pañca

original: Idha, meghiya, bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto hoti kalyāṇasahāyo kalyāṇasampavaṅko.
analyzed: idha meghiya bhikkhu kalyāṇa mittaḥ hoti kalyāṇa sahāyaḥ kalyāṇa sampavaṅkaḥ

original: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṁ paṭhamo dhammo paripākāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: a paripakkāya meghiya cetaḥ vimuttiyāḥ ayam paṭhamaḥ dhammo paripākāya savattati

original: Puna caparaṁ, meghiya, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
analyzed: puna capara meghiya bhikkhu sīlavā hoti pātimokkha savara savutaḥ viharati ācāra gocara sampannaḥ aṇumattesu vajjesu bhaya dassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu

original: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṁ dutiyo dhammo paripākāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: a paripakkāya meghiya cetaḥ vimuttiyāḥ ayam dutiyaḥ dhammo paripākāya savattati

original: Puna caparaṁ, meghiya, bhikkhu yāyaṁ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā ekantanibbidāya
analyzed: puna capara meghiya bhikkhu yā ayam kathā abhisallekhikā cetaḥ vivaraṇa sappāyā ekanta nibbidāya

original: virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati, seyyathidaṁ—appicchakathā,
analyzed: virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati sā iyyathida appiccha kathā

original: santuṭṭhikathā, pavivekakathā, asaṁsaggakathā, vīriyārambhakathā, sīlakathā, samādhikathā,
analyzed: santuṭṭhi kathā paviveka kathā a sasagga kathā vīriya ārambha kathā sīla kathā samādhi kathā

original: paññākathā, vimuttikathā, vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā; evarūpāya kathāya nikāmalābhī
analyzed: paññā kathā vimutti kathā vimutti ñāṇa dassana kathā evarūpāya kathāya nikāma lābhī

original: hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
analyzed: hoti a kiccha lābhī a kasira lābhī

original: Aparipākāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṁ tatiyo dhammo paripākāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: a paripākāya meghiya cetaḥ vimuttiyāḥ ayam tatiyaḥ dhammo paripākāya savattati

original: Puna caparaṁ, meghiya, bhikkhu āraddhavīriyo viharati, akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya, kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upasampadāya, thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
analyzed: puna capara meghiya bhikkhu āraddha vīriyaḥ viharati akusalānam dhammānam pahānāya kusalānam dhammānam upasampadāya thāmavā daḷha parakkamaḥ a nikkhitta dhuraḥ kusalesu dhammesu

original: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṁ catuttho dhammo paripākāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: a paripakkāya meghiya cetaḥ vimuttiyāḥ ayam catuttho dhammo paripākāya savattati

original: Puna caparaṁ, meghiya, bhikkhu paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
analyzed: puna capara meghiya bhikkhu paññavā hoti udayattha gāminiyā paññāya samannāgataḥ ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkha kkhaya gāminiyā

original: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṁ pañcamo dhammo paripākāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: a paripakkāya meghiya cetaḥ vimuttiyāḥ ayam pañcamaḥ dhammo paripākāya savattati

original: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ime pañca dhammā paripākāya saṁvattanti.
analyzed: a paripakkāya meghiya cetaḥ vimuttiyāḥ ime pañca dhammā paripākāya savattanti

original: Kalyāṇamittassetaṁ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṁ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa
analyzed: kalyāṇa mittassa ita meghiya bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkham kalyāṇa sahāyassa kalyāṇa sampavaṅkassa

original: yaṁ sīlavā bhavissati, pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharissati, ācāragocarasampanno,
analyzed: yam sīlavā bhavissati pātimokkha savara savutaḥ viharissati ācāra gocara sampannaḥ

original: aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhissati sikkhāpadesu.
analyzed: aṇumattesu vajjesu bhaya dassāvī samādāya sikkhissati sikkhāpadesu

original: Kalyāṇamittassetaṁ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṁ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa
analyzed: kalyāṇa mittassa ita meghiya bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkham kalyāṇa sahāyassa kalyāṇa sampavaṅkassa

original: yaṁ yāyaṁ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya
analyzed: yam yā ayam kathā abhisallekhikā cetaḥ vivaraṇa sappāyai ekanta nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya

original: upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati, seyyathidaṁ—appicchakathā, santuṭṭhikathā,
analyzed: upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati sā iyyathida appiccha kathā santuṭṭhi kathā

original: pavivekakathā, asaṁsaggakathā, vīriyārambhakathā, sīlakathā, samādhikathā, paññākathā,
analyzed: pa viveka kathā a saṃsagga kathā vīriya ārambha kathā sīla kathā samādhi kathā paññā kathā

original: vimuttikathā, vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā; evarūpāya kathāya nikāmalābhī bhavissati akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
analyzed: vimutti kathā vimutti ñāṇa dassana kathā evarūpāya kathāya nikāma lābhī bhavissati akiccha lābhī akasira lābhī

original: Kalyāṇamittassetaṁ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṁ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa
analyzed: kalyāṇa mittassa ita meghiya bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkham kalyāṇa sahāyassa kalyāṇa sampavaṅkassa

original: yaṁ āraddhavīriyo viharissati akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya, kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ
analyzed: yam āraddha vīriyaḥ viharissati akusalānam dhammānam pahānāya kusalānam dhammānam

original: upasampadāya, thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
analyzed: upasampadāya thāmavā daḷha parakkamaḥ a nikkhitta dhuraḥ kusalesu dhammesu

original: Kalyāṇamittassetaṁ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṁ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa
analyzed: kalyāṇa mittassa ita meghiya bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkham kalyāṇa sahāyassa kalyāṇa sampavaṅkassa

original: yaṁ paññavā bhavissati, udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya
analyzed: yam paññavā bhavissati udaya ttha gāminiyā paññāya samannāgataḥ ariyāya nibbedhikāya

original: sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
analyzed: sammā dukkha kkhaya gāminiyā

original: Tena ca pana, meghiya, bhikkhunā imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya cattāro dhammā uttari bhāvetabbā—
analyzed: tena ca pana meghiya bhikkhunā imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya cattāro dhammā uttari bhāvetabbā

original: asubhā bhāvetabbā rāgassa pahānāya, mettā bhāvetabbā byāpādassa pahānāya, ānāpānassati bhāvetabbā vitakkupacchedāya, aniccasaññā bhāvetabbā asmimānasamugghātāya.
analyzed: asubhā bhāvetabbā rāgassa pahānāya mettā bhāvetabbā byāpādassa pahānāya āna apāna sati bhāvetabbā vitakka upacchedāya anicca saññā bhāvetabbā asmimāna samugghātāya

original: Aniccasaññino hi, meghiya, anattasaññā saṇṭhāti,
analyzed: anicca saññinaḥ hi meghiya anatta saññā saṇṭhāti

original: anattasaññī asmimānasamugghātaṁ pāpuṇāti diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānan”ti.
analyzed: anatta saññī pāpuṇāti diṭṭhe iva dhamme nibbānam ti

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi

original: “Khuddā vitakkā sukhumā vitakkā,
analyzed: khuddā vitakkā sukhumā vitakkā

original: Anugatā manaso uppilāvā;
analyzed: anugatā manasaḥ uppilāvā

original: Ete avidvā manaso vitakke,
analyzed: ete a vidvāḥ manasaḥ vitakke

original: Hurā huraṁ dhāvati bhantacitto.
analyzed: hurā huram dhāvati bhantacitto

original: Ete ca vidvā manaso vitakke,
analyzed: ete ca vidvāḥ manasaḥ vitakke

original: Ātāpiyo saṁvaratī satīmā;
analyzed: ātāpiyā savaratī

original: Anugate manaso uppilāve,
analyzed: anugate manasaḥ uppilāve

original: Asesamete pajahāsi buddho”ti.
analyzed: asesam ete pajahāsi buddha iti

original: Paṭhamaṁ.
